duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify, pitch, and develop exceptional client (business), and candidate relationships providing solutions, delivering results for our clients, and enhancing candidates' careers.
Source highly skilled candidates through headhunting, interviewing, and being the go-to Consultant.
Networking, and developing new business relationships.
Business development and pitching Spencer Ogden's services to potential clients.
Achieving set targets and working to deadlines on a weekly, monthly, and quarterly basis.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree preferable; we are open to degree type.
